group_1.textRight: Do you play a sport, too?

group_1.textLeft: Here!@See for yourself in this album!

group_1.textRight: Wow!@Is that really you?!
Your hair's so short!@And look at that tan!

group_1.textLeft: Hehe, yeah!
I used to go to my brother's@baseball practices all the time...
And then I'd play catch with@my dad once we got home.
I was [chara:300201:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]such a baseball @kid when we were little!

group_1.textRight: Sounds like it...@You look like a boy!
So what made you go@from baseball to cheerleading?
It looks like you were really@in love with the sport.
Didn't you want to keep playing?

group_1.textLeft: Of course I did!

group_1.textRight: So...why didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: I hit a wall that I didn't@have the power to climb.
Teacher!@Here are my club forms!

group_1.textRight: You want to join the baseball club?! Oh!@You're applying for[chara:800700:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json] equipment manager!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
No.@I want to be on the team!

group_1.textRight: Ah...@I see, um...
Well they do let girls play@in Little League, don't they?

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*

group_1.textRight: Sorry, Natsuki.
The rules won't let us field any@girls on a junior high baseball team.
You could definitely be an equipment@manager though, if you wanted to.

group_1.textLeft: Aw man...

group_1.textRight: I see…
Ah yeah, that glass ceiling...@Not much you could've done about that.

group_1.textLeft: Exactly.

group_1.textRight: I mean, I guess not...
Are you saying that I would have had@a shot at joining the team, Kaede?
Huh?! No! No way!@I d-didn't mean it like that!
Bahaha!@Sorry, I put you on the spot there!
You're just too easy a target!

group_1.textLeft: She really is, isn't she!

group_1.textRight: Right?!
What do you mean?@Come on, guys...
But wait, couldn't you still play?

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: Baseball, I mean!@There's sandlot baseball!
You know, casual games you@set up with people in town.
Did you ever try joining@something like that?

group_1.textLeft: Are you psychic? I sure did!

group_1.textRight: So, do you still play?

group_1.textLeft: Nope.@I was able to join and all, sure.
But it was pretty boring,@so I quit not too long after.

group_1.textRight: Really?@What made it so boring?

group_1.textLeft: I asked myself the same thing!
I mean, I was a baseball kid,@right? I could hold my own!
But then...
My brother took me to one of our@Little League teammate's games...
And suddenly it all made sense.
